statements.query: MATCH (n:SNSTopic)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:SNSTopic)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:SNSSubscription)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:SNSSubscription)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
